Name: Cherry Velvet
Ingredients: 20 ml Vermouth amaro - medium (e.g. Cocchi Vermouth Amaro)
15 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Rich Pedro Ximénez sherry and Italian amaro add complexity and depth of flavour to luxurious brandy.
History: Created in 2015 by Mickael Lenu at Roka Aldwych in London, England. Mickael's original recipe calls for Martell Cordon Bleu cognac .
Nutrition: One serving of Cherry Velvet contains 161 calories
